product_name: Headsweats Shorty Super Duty Helmet Liner
long_description: The short-tail Headsweats Shorty Super Duty helmet liner is a no-brainer to put on for moisture management and protection from the sun. CoolMax(R) polyester fabric wicks moisture, moving it to outer layers for quick drying. CoolMax terry headband absorbs moisture and prevents sweat from hitting your eyes. Elastic band keeps cap in place without any adjustments. Headsweats Shorty Super Duty cap fits under any helmet. With an SPF 20 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The short-tail Headsweats Shorty Super Duty helmet liner is a no-brainer to put on for moisture management and protection from the sun.
